text: Families flock to the sands of Marina on a warm Sunday evening. The city recorded a maximum and minimum temperature of 32.6 degrees and 27.7 degrees Celsius respectively on Sunday. Temperatures are likely to increase as the summer is approaching. “Last week, there was a 2.5 to 3 degrees Celsius rise in temperature,” said S.B. Thampi, Deputy Director, Regional Meteorological Department —Photo: K. Pichumani
title: Bid to beat the heat
